#summary brief description

= SYNOPSIS =

So, what's this all about? It's [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IRC IRC] server for UTF world. Basically it means IDN and iconv, and they're supported, both.


= Key Features =

  * SSL support
  * IPv6 support
  * IRC Services support
  * compressed server to server links (zlib support)
  * topic synchronization after netsplit
  * masquerading real hostnames for clients (umode +x)
